message: Let's start with a fair 50/50 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, how about 60/40?
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. How about a compromise - 55/45?
I can do 58/42, that's my compromise
This is a negotiation, Bob.  I'm meeting you closer to the middle.
I'll go down a bit, 57/43 is my new offer
Bob, we're running out of time. This is very close to a 50/50 split, take it before we both get nothing.
